get.description:
Get multiple users with pagination and filtering.

Args:
    db: Database session
    skip: Number of records to skip
    limit: Maximum number of records to return
    search: Search string for name, username or email
    role: Filter by user role

Get list of chats with extensive filtering and pagination.

The endpoint supports filtering by all safe chat fields including:
- Basic info: search, theme_id, is_blocked, is_deleted, is_processed
- Location: country, city, region, language
- Chat type: is_forum, is_restricted, allows_ads, allows_links, etc.
- Members count: members_count_min, members_count_max
- Message permissions: can_send_media, can_send_photos, etc.
- Message settings: repeat_after_min/max, minimal_send_interval_min/max, etc.
- Dates: last_check_date_from, last_check_date_to

Args:
    db: Database session
    skip: Number of records to skip (pagination)
    limit: Maximum number of records to return (pagination, max 100)
    filter_params: Chat filter parameters

post.description:
Create a new chat.

Either username or invite_link must be provided.
If a chat with the provided username already exists, the username will be removed from the existing chat.

delete.description:
Soft delete a chat (set is_deleted=True).

This is a soft delete operation that marks the chat as deleted but doesn't remove it from the database.

schema.title: Response Read Chat Themes Api V1 Chats  Chat Id  Themes Get

put.description: Update chat themes (replace all existing themes).

post.description:
Restore a soft-deleted chat (set is_deleted=False).

This operation reverses the soft delete by setting is_deleted=False.

get.description: Get list of themes with filtering and pagination.
Get list of chats by theme ID with filtering and pagination.

Get list of sessions with filtering and pagination.

Args:
    db: Database session
    skip: Number of records to skip
    limit: Maximum number of records to return
    search: Search string for phone number, country or provider
    status: Filter by status
    is_premium: Filter by premium status
    country: Filter by country
    provider: Filter by provider
    deleted: Filter by deletion status
    spamblock: Filter by spam block status
    frozen: Filter by frozen status
    test_group: Filter by test group

patch.description:
Update session.

Args:
    session_id: Session ID
    db: Database session
    session_update: Session update data

Returns:
    Updated session

get.description:
Get list of posts with filtering and pagination.

- **order_id**: Filter by order ID
- **alternative_for**: Filter by parent post ID (for alternatives)
- **theme_id**: Filter by theme ID
- **search**: Search in post text

put.description: Update post themes (replace all existing themes).

get.description: Get themes assigned to a post.

schema.title: Response Read Post Themes Api V1 Posts  Post Id  Themes Get

post.description: Add a theme to a post.

delete.description: Remove a theme from a post.

get.description:
Get list of orders with filtering and pagination.

- **status**: Filter by status
- **is_premium**: Filter by premium status
- **client_id**: Filter by client ID
- **boss_id**: Filter by boss ID
- **search**: Search in session fields and ad_description
